titles: To all whom it may concern. When Herennius was discarded by Augustus, out of his armie, for his gross midemeanors and dissolute and debaucht carriage: ...
author: Williams, Richard, b. 1606 or 7.
notes: Title from caption and opening words of text.
Argues that a "Mr. Sheepheard (late usher of Merchant-Taylors School)" is incompetent.
Reproduction of the original in the British Library.
keywords: Teachers --  Rating of --  England --  Early works to 1800.
